arabicText: وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَئِمَّةًۭ يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ فِعْلَ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا عَـٰبِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	made	them	leaders	who	guide	by	
Our	 command,	 and	 We	 sent	 them	 the	
divine	revelation	to	do	good	deeds	and	to	
keep	 the	 prayer	 established	 and	 to	 give	
charity;	and	they	used	to	worship	Us.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Hamne	unheiñ	Imām	kiya	ke	Hamāre	
hukm	 se	 bulāte	 haiñ	 aur	 hamne	 unheiñ	
waḥi		bheji	achche	kām	karne	aur	Namāz	
barpā	 rakhne	 aur	 Zakāt	 dene	 ki	 aur	 woh	
hamāri	bandagi	karte	they

arabicText: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًۭا وَعِلْمًۭا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَت تَّعْمَلُ ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَ ۗ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍۢ فَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 gave	 Lut	 the	 kingdom	 and	
knowledge,	and	We	rescued	him	from	the	
township	 that	 committed	 vile	 deeds;	
indeed	 those	 evil	 people	 were	
disobedient.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Lūt ko	 hamne	 hukumat	aur	 ‘ilm	 diyā	
aur	 usey	 us	 basti	 se	 najāt	 bakhshi	 jo	
gande	kām	karti	thi,	be-shak	woh	bure	log	
be- hukm	they

arabicText: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hamne	usey	Apni	raḥmat	meiñ	dākhil	
kiya	be-shak	woh	hamāre	Qurb-e-khās	ke	
sazāwāroñ	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: وَنُوحًا إِذْ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	before	this	when	Nooh	called	Us	- We	
therefore	 heard	 his	 prayer	 and	 rescued	
him	 and	 his	 household	 from	 the	 great	
calamity.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Nūh ko	 jab	 us-se	 pehle	 jab	 usne	
hameiñ	 pukārā	 to	 hamne	 uski	 Du’ā	
Qubool	 ki	 aur	 usey	 aur	 uske	 ghar	 wāloñ	
ko	badi	sakhti	se	najāt	di

arabicText: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍۢ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 helped	 him	 against	 the	 people	
who	 denied	 Our	 signs;	 indeed	 they	 were	
evil	 people,	 We	 therefore	 drowned	 them	
all.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 hamne	 un	 logoñ	 par	 usko	 madad	 di	
jinhoñe	 hamāri	 Āyateiñ	 jhutlāiñ	 be-shak	
woh	 bure	 log	 they	 to	 hamne	 un	 sabko	
dubo	diyā

arabicText: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ إِذْ يَحْكُمَانِ فِى ٱلْحَرْثِ إِذْ نَفَشَتْ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلْقَوْمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكْمِهِمْ شَـٰهِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 Dawud	 and	 Sulaiman,	
when	they	were	deciding	the dispute	of	a	
field,	 when	 some	 people’s	 sheep	 had	
strayed	 into	 it	 at	 night;	 and	 We	 were	
Present	at	the	time	of	their	deciding.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Dāwood aur	Sulaimān ko	yād	karo	jab	
kheti	ka	ek	jhagdā	chukāte	they	jab	rāt	ko	
us	meiñ	kuchh	logo	ki	bakriyāñ	Chootiñ	aur	ham	unke	hukm	ke	waqt	hāzir	they

arabicText: فَفَهَّمْنَـٰهَا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيْنَا حُكْمًۭا وَعِلْمًۭا ۚ وَسَخَّرْنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلْجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحْنَ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۚ وَكُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	explained	the	case	to	Sulaiman;	and	to	both	We	gave	the	kingdom	and	knowledge;	and	
subjected	the	hills	to	proclaim	the	Purity	along	with	Dawud,	and	(also	subjected)	the	birds;	and	
these	were	Our	works.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hamne	 woh	 m’āmlā	 Sulaimān ko	 samjhā	 diyā	 aur	 donoñ	 ko	 hukumat	 aur	 ‘ilm	 ‘atā	 kiya,	 aur	
Dāwood ke	 sāth	 pahād	musakkhar	 farmā	 diye	 ke	 tasbeeh	 karte	 aur	 parinde	 aur	 yeh	Hamāre	
kām	they.

arabicText: وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ صَنْعَةَ لَبُوسٍۢ لَّكُمْ لِتُحْصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأْسِكُمْ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُمْ شَـٰكِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	 taught	him	 to	make	a	garment	 for	you,	 to	protect	you	 from	your	hurt;	so	will	you	be	
thankful?
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	hamne	usey	tumhārā	ek	pahnāwā	banānā	sikhāyā	ke	tumheiñ	tumhāri	āñch	se	bachāye,	to	
kya	tum	shukr	karoge?
